info.name: Fate/Grand Order Wikia Fandom - Simplistic Dark
info.description: Dark mode for Fandom's Fate/Grand Order Wikia. Also removes videos, top notification and other wikis' advertisements from the right side.
info.additionalInfo:
Made this mainly for myself, but anyone is free to use it as well.

Github repository: https://github.com/JemisaR/DarkModes

Suggestions are welcomed with open mind.
